name: GiveKissToNeighbor2D
description:
A game where you play as a young girl moving into town. You find the neighbor, and you end up dating him. Do you want to become a game tester? Sign up here and get the following perks and remember it is free!

  • Get Beta Updates
  • Have Fun
  • Your Ideas go to The Game

We also need translators. Click here to become one of those. You get extra thanks and, the game for free.
